<div align="center">

# FPGA-VGA-Driver

**A Verilog HDL implementation of a VGA driver for the Intel/Altera Cyclone IV FPGA.**

![HDL](https://img.shields.io/badge/HDL-Verilog-7177bd?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
![Toolchain](https://img.shields.io/badge/Quartus-Quartus?logo=intel&logoColor=white&label=Toolchain&labelColor=grey&color=%233995e6)
![FPGA](https://img.shields.io/badge/Cyclone%20IV-Cyclone%20IV?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&label=FPGA&labelColor=grey&color=%231e2033)
![Resolution](https://img.shields.io/badge/Resolution-640x480%20%40%2060Hz-green?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)
